scripts.build-dev-watch: concurrently " npm run build-watch " " npm run start-dev "
scripts.docker-build: npm run build && docker build -t cloud.canister.io:5000/928779879786/api .
scripts.docker-run: docker run -d --name api --network=host -p 8080:8080 -e FFK_DB_SERVER=$FFK_DB_SERVER -e FFK_DB_NAME=$FFK_DB_NAME -e FFK_DB_USER=$FFK_DB_USER -e FFK_DB_PASSWORD=$FFK_DB_PASSWORD -e FFK_API_ADDRESS=$FFK_API_ADDRESS -e FFK_DISOCRD_PANEL_CLIENT_ID=$FFK_DISOCRD_PANEL_CLIENT_ID cloud.canister.io:5000/928779879786/api
scripts.deploy: ssh $USER@4.71.159.157 'docker stop api | docker rm api | docker run --name api -d -p 8080:8080 -e FFK_DB_USER=$FFK_DB_USER -e FFK_DB_PASSWORD=$FFK_DB_PASSWORD -e FFK_DB_NAME=$FFK_DB_NAME -e FFK_DB_SERVER=$FFK_DB_SERVER -e FFK_DISOCRD_PANEL_CLIENT_ID=$FFK_DISOCRD_PANEL_CLIENT_ID cloud.canister.io:5000/928779879786/api'
scripts.update: ssh $USER@4.71.159.157 'docker pull cloud.canister.io:5000/928779879786/api && docker commit api api:latest'
scripts.release-cold: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-push && npm run deploy
scripts.release-hot: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-push && npm run update
